name: mpr-dashboard
description: Dashboard and analytics for USDA Mandatory Price Reporting
author: Andrew Kirkegaard

scripts.dev: TAG=$(git describe --tags --dirty); yarn predev && docker compose up --build
scripts.pretest: docker-compose --file docker-compose.test.yaml down && docker-compose --file docker-compose.test.yaml build
scripts.test: yarn pretest && docker-compose --file docker-compose.test.yaml run --rm sut
scripts.build: TAG=$(git describe --tags --dirty); yarn workspace api prepublish && yarn workspace app prepublish
scripts.start: yarn build && TAG=$(git describe --tags --dirty); docker stack deploy -c docker-compose.yaml mpr-dashboard
